title: I was Banned ??
body:
Hi I am long time league player. I was recently banned for the use of third party programs. But I have no idea what programs I used. I Am very surprised that I was banned and would like some further insight as the programs i am acused of using. Thanks for reading and i hope i can have my account back.

Edit: PLease unban me I emailed player support but they said i used third party exploits when I didnt plz. I didnt use any third party programs

replies.body: I don't have the context available to offer visibility on this, and due to the nature of sensitive account information isn't something we can really discuss on the boards.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our player behavior team can dive into this with you.  Hang tight until then!
thx i already sent a support tiket when may i receive a reply ?
